article: Please come to meet a family from Canada . The girl ' s name is Wendy . Her family are in China now . Her father and mother work in Shanghai . Wendy ' s father is an office worker and her mother teaches English in a school . Wendy has two brothers but no sisters . They are all students but they are in different school . She is in Grade Eight and her brothers are in Grade Six . They love their schools . Wendy usually goes to school with her brothers _ . Sometimes their father takes them in his car . In the afternoon , they have lunch at school . They like to play with their classmates . And they often help each other .
